message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product, I think you'll find it very useful. I'm asking for $200 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $120 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $170. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go as low as $140?
